# All filenames are taken to be relative to the directory containing
# this file.
#
# NOTE: These entries are normal glob patterns, with the addition that
# a leading '**/' means 'any number of directories here' (including 0,
# so **/foo matches 'foo', 'a/foo', 'a/b/foo', etc.)  Directories
# should end in '/'.

# Source control directories
.hg/
.git/

# Third-party code

facebook.py

gae_mini_profiler/
oauth_provider/

# Subrepo directories

# Autogenerated code
**/combined.js
**/combined.css
**/compressed.js
**/compressed.css
**/hashed-*.js
**/hashed-*.css
**/*.handlebars.js
**/compiled_templates
**/node_modules
js_css_packages/packages_compressed.py
js_css_packages/packages_hash.py

# Exemptions in our code
exercisestats/number_trivia.py
secrets.py

# Our python code, which should be made pep8-compliant but isn't yet.
#
# To update this list:
#    1) remove all the lines below this comment
#    2) Run make lint | cut -d: -f1 | sort -u | fgrep .py > /tmp/new_blacklist
#    3) Add the contents of /tmp/new_blacklist below this comment
#    4) Run 'hg diff' to make sure the results look reasonable!
#

#    1) remove all the lines below this comment

#    3) Add the contents of /tmp/new_blacklist below this comment
